question_text: Why is it critical to maintain proper wire pairing inside a twisted pair cable when terminating connectors?
answer_options: To meet minimum cable jacket thickness requirements
To avoid damaging the outer shielding
To reduce signal degradation from impedance mismatch and crosstalk
To ensure correct voltage is applied to each wire
correct_answer: To reduce signal degradation from impedance mismatch and crosstalk
explanation: Correct pairing preserves the cableâ€™s electrical characteristics, ensuring minimal interference and accurate signal transmission.
